sql.name: hbeoms.twowaysallformintimerolenamelink_sl
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1) as 编号, t.c700000001 as 工单名称, t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间, t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题, t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业, t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,(select * from {600} union all select * from {700}) pro,{300} u,{400} g,{500} gu where t.c700000004=u.C630000003 and t.c700000001=pro.c700020002 {1}{2}{3}{4} and t.C1=pro.C700020001 and g.C1=gu.C620000027 and gu.C620000028=u.C1 and pro.c700020011 in ('已完成','待受理','已派发','提交审批')

sql.name: hbeoms.twowaysallformintimesendscopenamelink_sl
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1) as 编号, t.c700000001 as 工单名称, t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间, t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题, t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业, t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,(select * from {600} union all select * from {700}) pro where 1=1 {1}{2}{3}{4} and t.C1=pro.C700020001 and t.c700000001=pro.c700020002 and pro.c700020011 in ('已完成','待受理','已派发','提交审批')

sql.name: hbeoms.twowaysallformintimepfrolenamelink_sl
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1) as 编号, t.c700000001 as 工单名称, t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间, t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题, t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业, t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,(select * from {100} union all select * from {200}) pro,{300} u,{400} g,{500} gu where 1=1 {2} {1} {3} {4} and t.C1=pro.C700020001 and t.c700000001=pro.c700020002 and g.C1=gu.C620000027 and gu.C620000028=u.C1 and u.C630000003=pro.C700020009 and pro.c700020011 in ('已完成','待受理','已派发','提交审批')

sql.name: hbeoms.twowaysallformintimesendpfscopenamelink_sl
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1) as 编号, t.c700000001 as 工单名称, t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间, t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题, t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业, t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,(select * from {100} union all select * from {200}) pro,{300} u,{400} g,{500} gu,{300} uu,{400} gg,{500} gugu where t.c700000004=u.C630000003 and t.c700000001=pro.c700020002 and t.C1=pro.C700020001 and g.C1=gu.C620000027 and gu.C620000028=u.C1 {1}{2}{3}{4} and gg.C1=gugu.C620000027 and gugu.C620000028=uu.C1 and uu.C630000003=pro.C700020009 and pro.c700020011 in ('已完成','待受理','已派发','提交审批')

sql.name: qheoms.twotypeformsumnewformnamecarful1_sl
sql.item: select 't'||t.schemaid,BaseCategory.C650000001 as basechname, BaseCategory.C650000002 as basename from {500} BaseCategory,arschema t where t.name=BaseCategory.C650000002 and t.schemaid={5}
